reviews.review_msg: Arrogant little man whose long-winded lectures are marred by a complete lack of teaching ability. Goes overtime on every lecture while having nothing interesting to say, then begrudges those who don't wish to attend. Plays favorites too: get on his good side or suffer his condescending, pseudo-femine "yeah..." everytime you try to participate.

Impossibly tough marker, plays favourites constantly.  I was his buddy for the first half of the course and was getting an A, then later I stopped attending his boring lectures and suddenly he starts giving me dirty looks and my grades drop.  Beware this guy, he's very shallow.
